description: My mother's sister brought me to work
title: Child employment
content:
My name is Juliet, I am 11 years old. My mother died two years ago and I don’t know my father. I used to stay with my grandmother. At the beginning of this year, my mother’s sister brought me to Kampala to work. I work as a house girl. My work starts at 5am and doesn’t end until midnight. I am paid 20,000 shillings every month.I don’t even go to school.

Kno da facts

Take Action!
